content.webTitle: Why do we build cars that can reach speeds of at least twice the motorway  limit?

fields.headline: Why do we build cars that can reach speeds of at least twice the motorway  limit?
fields.bodyText: Why do we build cars that can reach speeds of at least twice the limit on the motorways? Nick Broad • Post your answers – and new questions – below or email them to nq@theguardian.com
